zaman description: Zaman Real Estate Company is the future integration between real estate development and marketing. It was established in 2014 AD, when it was founded by Sheikh Mohammed bin Dakhil Allah Al-Subaie, who has sufficient experience that qualifies Zaman to assume the position it deserves among the major national companies, thus being the nucleus of moving towards the horizon of development in the previous specialization. He mentioned it as a company specializing in real estate and project management. Zaman is also keen to be the leading company in the real estate field, providing high-quality services to its customers and keen to satisfy customers and achieve their aspirations.
vision desc: To be leaders in the field of marketing and real estate development in the Middle East and North Africa region by developing premium projects that promote sustainable and self-sufficient living. In addition, we focus on the quality of achievements and services specifically designed for our clients to provide a luxurious lifestyle with exceptional investment returns.
mission desc: We strive to create simple, innovative, and self-sustaining development built on the highest standards. We leverage our passion and commitment to deliver innovative services and exceptional quality to our clients.
values desc: We pay full attention to every detail, work under time and budget constraints, while respecting all counterparts and achieving sustainability.
innovation desc: Through our real estate projects, we provide our clients with innovative and smart services that allow They have a easier lifestyle and business operations.
commitment desc: Commitment We believe that commitment is the core of our existence. We are always keen to build a strong relationship with our customers and meet their needs precisely.
Building reputation desc: Zaman seeks in all directions to build a strong reputation related to quality and excellence in providing its services to all its customers.
